title: Lekki Commercial Plaza Development
overview: A modern 5-story commercial complex featuring retail spaces, offices, and underground parking. The project showcases contemporary Nigerian architecture with sustainable design elements.
objectives: Deliver a premium commercial space meeting international standards
scopeAndApproach: Our team managed the complete construction cycle from foundation to fit-out. We utilized advanced construction methodologies including precast concrete elements and modular systems to accelerate delivery. The project incorporated energy-efficient systems, rainwater harvesting, and natural ventilation to reduce operational costs.

testimonial.quote: Teamwork Safe Operations delivered exceptional quality and professionalism throughout the project. Their commitment to safety and timely delivery exceeded our expectations.
testimonial.author: Engr. Chidi Okonkwo

title: Port Harcourt Industrial Solar Farm
overview: A 5MW solar power installation serving multiple industrial facilities in the Trans-Amadi Industrial Layout. This project represents one of the largest commercial solar installations in Rivers State.
scopeAndApproach: The project involved site assessment, system design, procurement of tier-1 solar panels and inverters, installation, grid integration, and commissioning. We worked closely with the Port Harcourt Electricity Distribution Company (PHED) to ensure seamless grid connection and compliance with all regulatory requirements.

testimonial.quote: The solar installation has transformed our energy profile. Teamwork Safe Operations demonstrated deep technical expertise and delivered a system that performs above projections.
testimonial.author: Barr. Ifeoma Nwachukwu

title: Gwarinpa Residential Estate Phase II
overview: Development of 120 residential units including 3-bedroom and 4-bedroom terrace houses with modern amenities, security infrastructure, and recreational facilities.
scopeAndApproach: Utilizing modular construction techniques and local materials, we delivered quality homes efficiently. The project included roads, drainage, water supply, solar street lighting, and a community center. We engaged local subcontractors and suppliers, contributing to the local economy.

testimonial.quote: Professional execution from start to finish. The homes are beautiful and our buyers are extremely happy with the quality.
testimonial.author: Arch. Funmi Adeleke

title: Warri Refinery Equipment Overhaul
overview: Comprehensive shutdown maintenance and equipment overhaul for critical processing units, including inspection, repair, and replacement of major equipment.
scopeAndApproach: Our team of specialized technicians conducted detailed inspections, NDT testing, mechanical repairs, and performance testing. We coordinated with multiple vendors and worked round-the-clock shifts to meet the aggressive timeline while maintaining strict HSE protocols.

testimonial.quote: Exceptional technical capability and safety culture. The team delivered beyond expectations in a challenging operational environment.
testimonial.author: Engr. Samuel Okoro

title: Marina Office Tower Renovation
overview: Complete renovation of a 15-story office building including structural upgrades, new MEP systems, facade restoration, and modern interior fit-out.
objectives: Modernize building systems to Grade A standards
scopeAndApproach: Phased renovation approach allowing partial occupancy. Upgrades include new HVAC systems, LED lighting, building automation, high-speed elevators, and a modern glass facade. Special attention to heritage preservation of the 1970s structure.

testimonial.quote: The project is progressing smoothly with excellent quality control. The team's ability to work in an occupied building is remarkable.
testimonial.author: Mrs. Adaeze Nwankwo
testimonial.role: Head of Real Estate, Atlantic Properties PLC
